title: A full stack website: Daniel's Lab
description:
A modern, full-stack portfolio site featuring a custom-built blogging system with full-text search and authentication from scratch.
- **Modular backend**: Node.js, PostgreSQL, Zod, Meilisearch
- **Reactive frontend**: React, Tailwind CSS, Zustand, Shadcn UI, Framer Motion

title: Book Me: a meeting room booking calendar
description:
A modern, intuitive **room booking system** for students at **Hive Helsinki**.
- featuring a scrollable calendar UI, a custom **gridless layout**.
- Applies **role-based access control** with conflict prevention.

title: MushFinder: a mushroom identification helper
description:
An **experimental AI toy** powered by a custom CNN model.
- Trained on the **20 most common mushrooms** in Finnish forests
- Offers both **online** and **offline edge ML** versions
- Designed for mobile use and privacy-friendly
